issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

ATTACHMENT ID: 12880576 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
Why there are empty files? The raw data is empty or the empty files is generated after loading?

[~csun]: before i met empty files when using parquet files. The reason is that hive read parquet meta info to construct ParquetInputSplit in ParquetRecordReaderBase#getSplit.  In [ParquetRecordReaderBase#getSplit|https://github.com/apache/hive/blob/master/ql/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/ql/io/parquet/ParquetRecordReaderBase.java#L106], sometimes return NULL. Thus will cause empty file.
Patch looks simple and good to me. Is it possible to have a test case on this?
Submitting patch v1 for testing (it is not ready yet).
